query: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ABC=90°,DE垂直平分AC,垂足为O,AD∥BC,且AB=3,BC=4,则AD的长为()选项：['\\frac{25}{4}', '\\frac{25}{8}', '\\frac{15}{4}', '\\frac{15}{8}']
answer: 解:∵Rt△ABC中,∠ABC=90°,AB=3,BC=4,∴AC=√{AB²{+BC}²}=√{3²{+4}²}=5,∵DE垂直平分AC,垂足为O,∴OA=\frac{1}{2}AC=\frac{5}{2},∠AOD=∠B=90°,∵AD∥BC,∴∠A=∠C,∴△AOD∽△CBA,∴\frac{AD}{AC}=\frac{OA}{BC},即\frac{AD}{5}=\frac{2.5}{4},解得AD=\frac{25}{8},故选:B．
